food.question: I am yellow and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys enjoy eating me.
💛 I am a fruit that's usually the color of sunshine.
🔽 You peel my skin before you take a bite.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🔴 My color matches that of a fire truck
🥧 I taste delicious in a pie

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 A common cartoon rabbit loves me.
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyes.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 A large farm animal makes me
🥛 I am a liquid.
🍪 I taste great with cookies

food.question: I am made of flour and water. You bake me in the oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 Pizza dough is an example of me.
♨️ I need to be baked to be enjoyed
🍞 You can make toast with me

food.question: I am a sweet treat with layers. I often have frosting on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 People celebrate birthdays with me.
🍰 I come in lots of flavors, like chocolate and vanilla.
🕯️ Candles are put on top of me

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green and healthy.
🌳 I have many small branches with florets.
🧀 I taste good with cheese.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and sweet green flesh. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 My skin is brown and fuzzy.
✨ I am a good source of Vitamin C.
🟢 My insides are usually bright green.

food.question: I am a yellow spread that tastes good on toast. Bees help make me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 Winnie the Pooh loves me!
🐝 Bees help make me from flowers.
🥞 I taste great on pancakes.

food.question: I am a soft, white cheese made from milk and I am often on pizza. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 You can find me in Italian food.
🧀 I melt when heated.
🐮 I am made from cow's milk.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white and fun to play with! What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I can make a snowman!
🧤 You need gloves when you play with me.
🏔️ I often fall in the winter.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and shine in the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out during the day.
🕶️ You wear sunglasses when I'm bright.
🌻 Plants need me to live.

weather.question: I'm wet and fall from the sky. I help flowers grow and make puddles to splash in. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
💧 I fall from clouds.
🌱 Plants love me.

weather.question: I blow and I can be gentle or strong. Sometimes I carry leaves in the fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make kites fly high.
🌬️ You can feel me but you can't see me.
💨 I can blow leaves off trees.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain.

hints.text: 🐑 I look like fluffy sheep.
🌧️ I can block the sun.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky, followed by a loud crash. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I happen during a storm.
⛈️ I can be dangerous.
🔊 You hear thunder after you see me.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors in a curved line. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 You can see me when the sun is behind you.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet.
🍀 People say there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around over the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a swirling shape.
🌊 I can cause big waves.
🏠 You need to stay inside when I come near.

weather.question: I am very cold and icy and can cause lots of snow. I make it hard to see and drive.

hints.text: 🥶 I am a winter storm.
🚗 Driving is dangerous during me.
🐻 Animals might hibernate during me.

weather.question: I'm made of water, but I float in the air and sometimes make it hard to see. I'm like a cloud on the ground.

hints.text: 🌫️ I can make things look blurry.
🔦 You need bright lights when I'm around.
🌉 You often see me near the water.
